comment.body:
Cannot reproduce with your settings. 
Please try to disable-enable content blockers in Safari settings and restart Safari, and check for filters update.
Do not close AdGuard window ~60 seconds, because iOS will break configuration process.

issue.title: com.microsoft.xboxone.smartglass

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4.10.9

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.microsoft.xboxone.smartglass

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, EasyList

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, EasyPrivacy, Fanboy's Enhanced Tracking List, Fanboy's Anti-Facebook List, Fanboy's Anti-thirdparty Fonts

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

since we dont block events.data.microsoft.com in the dns list i suggest we start blocking for individual apps. blocking events.data.microsoft.com for apps is ok the only issue we had was with xbox and that was dns. so app basis is fine.

suggested filters:
|browser.events.data.microsoft.com^$app=com.microsoft.xboxone.smartglass
||self.events.data.microsoft.com^$app=com.microsoft.xboxone.smartglass
||mobile.events.data.microsoft.com^$app=com.microsoft.xboxone.smartglass

### Privacy

- [x] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body: Dangerous, common for MS apps.

comment.body:
Unfortunately, It can't be checked without an account. Is it caused by this rule `/.*/$permissions=join-ad-interest-group=(),document` or the `AdGuard Tracking Protection`?
If it's caused by the rule, please check one of this rules.
```adblock
@@||netshoes.com.br/auth/$permissions=join-ad-interest-group=()
@@||netshoes.com.br^$permissions=join-ad-interest-group=()
```

comment.body:
Cannot reproduce with your settings. Only when AdGuard is paused.
Please try to disable-enable content blockers in Safari settings and restart Safari, and check for filters update.
Do not close AdGuard window ~60 seconds, because iOS will break configuration process.

# Creating the pull request

> Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\
> If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\
> It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\
> Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it

## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [x] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [ ] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [x] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [x] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [ ] Filters maintenance.

## What issue is being fixed?

### Enter the issue address

https://comicbook.com/anime/news/jojos-bizarre-adventure-creator-steel-ball-run-art/

pull_request.title: Fix comicbook.com
pull_request.body:
# Creating the pull request

> Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\
> If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\
> It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\
> Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it

## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [x] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [ ] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [x] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [x] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [ ] Filters maintenance.

## What issue is being fixed?

### Enter the issue address

https://comicbook.com/anime/news/jojos-bizarre-adventure-creator-steel-ball-run-art/

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. Your comment

share button in Disqus comments on iOS and subscription

2. Screenshots

<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![IMG_7192](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/8407523d-e349-4cee-970c-fe98833ad18d)

</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot 2:</summary>

![IMG_7193](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/11b45dc6-c67b-4db3-982c-aa26423f7434)

</details>

### Terms

- [x] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard DNS

### AdGuard version

https://dns.adguard.com/dns-query

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Amazon TV Fire Stick 4K Max (2024)

### Where is the problem encountered?

7plus.com.au 

### Ad Blocking


### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

AdGuard DNS filter

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

I am using the "https://dns.adguard.com/DNS-query" DNS on Amazon Silk Browser for my Amazon TV Fire Stick 4K Max (2024).

 This DNS successfully blocks ads on the 7plus.com.au website, but i can't resume shows, movies, docomentries etc, where I left off because the Watch Progress is not syncing.

So for example : if I only watch 15 minutes of one specific show and then stop, if I return back to that specific show later, playback DOES NOT resume from the 15 minute mark, instead that specific show by default will restart from the very beginning.

Can this bug be patched/fixed on the https://dns.adguard.com/DNS-query for 7plus.com.au? 

### Privacy

- [x] I agree to follow this condition

因为你不懂中文。开启广告过滤插件后，文章内容变少了，并且文章内容中多了一段话，这段话让我关闭广告过滤插件。而且当我关闭Adguard，就会出现广告，然后我进行长截图时，就会触发广告，然后跳转到其他网站

Not reproduced on my end.
Try to update the filters (wait almost one minute there), clear browser data, restart it, open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/194856

issue.title: Add global removal for  Substack "subscribe" landing page to Adguard Annoyance.
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [x] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [x] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

Many (all?) Substack pages currently feature a pop-over landing page asking you to subscribe. This is highly annoying.

As an example, see https://chipsandcheese.com or https://www.noahpinion.blog/.

### Proposed solution

Currently there is a few Substacks in the filter lists that remove this pop-over.
It would be nice to replace this with a global filter rule added to the `Annoyance filter` (under the `Pop-ups` or `Other Annoyances` subfilter) , removing the pop-over for every substack page.

### Additional information

_No response_

issue.title: Add global removal for  Substack "subscribe" landing page to Adguard Annoyance.
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [x] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [x] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

Many (all?) Substack pages currently feature a pop-over landing page asking you to subscribe. This is highly annoying.

As an example, see https://chipsandcheese.com or https://www.noahpinion.blog/.

### Proposed solution

Currently there is a few Substacks in the filter lists that remove this pop-over.
It would be nice to replace this with a global filter rule added to the `Annoyance filter` (under the `Pop-ups` or `Other Annoyances` subfilter) , removing the pop-over for every substack page.

### Additional information

_No response_

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: Add global removal for  Substack "subscribe" landing page to Adguard Annoyance.
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [x] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [x] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

Many (all?) Substack pages currently feature a pop-over landing page asking you to subscribe. This is highly annoying.

As an example, see https://chipsandcheese.com or https://www.noahpinion.blog/.

### Proposed solution

Currently there is a few Substacks in the filter lists that remove this pop-over.
It would be nice to replace this with a global filter rule added to the `Annoyance filter` (under the `Pop-ups` or `Other Annoyances` subfilter) , removing the pop-over for every substack page.

### Additional information

_No response_

comment.body:
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/203243#issuecomment-2806675505 - In that case, you don't need to save subdomains as wildcard (`*.`).

I meant when the domain has a different name or tld (e.g. proxy hosting, own installation):

```
krystian3w-substack.agency
```

As it's a popover based on this API https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Reference/Global_attributes/popover, it's still worth checking if the click/touch under the hidden modal works. If it doesn't work, a scriptlet can be useful.

issue.title: Blank screen on https://ozon.ru
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin 1.63.2

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://ozon.ru

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. The mobile version of https://ozon.ru may occasionally display a blank white screen. In order to reproduce the issue, you may need to reload the page a couple of times. You must be logged in in order to reproduce the issue (If necessary, I can provide you with an account). Disabling the "AdGuard – Mobile Ads" filter list fixes the issue. Disabling cosmetic filters also fixes the issue. Reproducible on both Kiwi Browser and Fennec from F-Droid.

issue.body:
## The next song does not start with AdGuard extension v5, because of `ERR_UNSAFE_REDIRECT`

## Reported to devs:

https://issues.chromium.org/issues/375395102

Please leave a comment or `+1` the bug there

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/c217f1ea-5ef9-4373-adc0-7228bfde19dc)
